Id like to see an open assessment of the current risk @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK #stopthestink https://t.co/E44pv87BpY

@scottdegg @EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA @RedIndustries2 @PHE_uk @StinkStopthe I listened closely to the words of @ClareDinnisEA during her Radio Stoke interview on Friday. The key point I picked up is future scrutiny of what is being tipped in the landfill. When asked if that meant unlicensed waste has been put in there she didn‚Äôt give a straight answer!
@Samanth33412592 @StinkStopthe @RedIndustries2 @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA @DefraGovUK @Cap_it_off @SimonTagg @AaronBell4NUL Why do the @EnvAgency not seem to care?

#wednesdaythought is it not illegal to put tyres in landfill @RedIndustries2 please look into this @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA @DefraGovUK #StopTheStink #CloseItDown @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off @SimonTagg @AaronBell4NUL https://t.co/QwG198A8My

@a_merrydew @MattHancock @DefraGovUK @PHE_EoEngland @MPGeorgeEustice @EnvAgency @Cap_it_off Sleep deficit is a killer. You can only go so far and then you hit a wall. Have been very close to taking time off work simple due to lack of sleep. Staying at home isn‚Äôt an option though, the anxiety the the fumes would be worse I think! We cant continue like this ‚ù§Ô∏è

Breaking News . @EnvAgency have sanctioned the destruction of breeding birds tomorrow at the Lower Otter Restoration Project . This is #HS2 part 2 . PLEASE THINK AGAIN @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest Please follow @WiseBirding and RT https://t.co/I8Wv40YKqy
@ShaunLintern @EnvAgency Have a look at #Mullaghglass landfill site in Belfast/Lisburn in NI. Same thing is going on, residents also campaigning for #CleanAir Landfill sites are a national scandal!
@ShaunLintern @EnvAgency Brilliant work @ShaunLintern

@ShaunLintern @EnvAgency Thank you for highlighting this health crisis. Please help us make sure this never happens to another community in the UK again by signing and sharing this petition for tighter regulation of landfills #stopthestink https://t.co/Lgsdqydotl

@SianieRoo @MattHancock @DefraGovUK @PHE_EoEngland @MPGeorgeEustice @EnvAgency @Cap_it_off I don't look very beautiful at present. I just went to the supermarket (which, like my house, smells of H2S) and caught a glimpse of myself in the car mirror... The lack of sleep and severe stress are showing. It's just getting worse & worse. Time to submit my 4th report today.
